member.name: D3D10_PASS_DESC
member.summary: Describes an effect pass, which contains pipeline state.

member.name: D3D10_PASS_DESC.Name
member.summary: A string that contains the name of the pass; otherwise NULL.

member.name: D3D10_PASS_DESC.pIAInputSignature
member.summary: A pointer to the input signature or the vertex shader; otherwise NULL.

member.name: D3D10_PASS_DESC.IAInputSignatureSize
member.summary: The size of the input signature (in bytes).

member.name: D3D10_PASS_DESC.StencilRef
member.summary: The stencil-reference value used in the depth-stencil state (see Configuring Depth-Stencil Functionality (Direct3D 10)).

member.name: D3D10_PASS_DESC.SampleMask
member.summary: The sample mask for the blend state (see Configuring Blending Functionality (Direct3D 10)).

member.name: D3D10_PASS_DESC.BlendFactor
member.summary: The per-component blend factors (RGBA) for the blend state (see Configuring Blending Functionality (Direct3D 10)).
